projects.name: Hanssen
projects.description: A modern, Scandinavian-inspired portfolio website showcasing Hanssen’s handcrafted furniture collections, blending clean aesthetics with seamless functionality.
projects.about: Hanssen’s portfolio website was designed to highlight their exquisite Scandinavian furniture collections. The site embraces minimalist design principles, reflecting the brand’s ethos of simplicity and elegance. Built with Framer, it features a visually engaging layout that balances stunning imagery with intuitive navigation.
